Content: Brigadier V Weerakkody assumes office as new Director of Directorate of Electrical and Mechanical Engineers on Thursday (13) with religious observances. He succeeded Major General M.A.A.D Sirinaga. Prior to this appointment he has held the appointment of Centre Commandant, Sri Lanka Electrical and Mechanical Engineers Regimental Centre. Staff Officers and few Other Ranks of the Directorate were at the venue.
